DOC.brief_summary: The aim of the study was to verify the effects of moderate versus low sodium intake on pulmonary capillary wedge pressure (PCWP), determined by Doppler echocardiography and tissue Doppler imaging in patients suffering from compensated heart failure.
DOC.brief_title: Estimated Echocardiographic Pulmonary Capillary Wedge Pressure in Heart Failure
DOC.detailed_description: the study outcome is hospital readmission and mortality after 12 months of two different sodium diet.
DOC.criteria: compensated HF patients decompensated HF patients
